Name: The 3rd Building 三教
About the game: “Remember it? Remember it! ” I can’t remember anything. Somebody keeps speaking to me: ”Where are you? Where are you? ” I need to go into my mind and find myself! I have come to this place named “The Third Building”. My memory is buried here. “The Third Building” is a first-person horror game. Play this “cursed” game to find the secrets about me and an indie-game studio in the third building. Every college has a haunted building This game is based on true stories from the producer. I hope I can tell my story. But after all game is not reality. The scariest thing is reality.
